trends: There have been no other sightings in North Brunswick
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was stopped at a red light on Howe Lane, Somerset, NJ and happened to look upand see what appeared to be a bright silver disk moving across the sky ratherslowly and suddenly disappear. Shortly after the disk disappeared a plane (jet)came into view. What I saw previously bore no resemblance to a plane from anyangle. What struck me the most was how it was there and then poof, gone. Thedisk appeared to move slower than any planes that are normally in the area. Itwas too far and too bright to see any details. I had Polaroid Sunglasses on atthe time. I know this is rather vague but I thought if someone else reports asighting this would lend credibility to it.
